segments.text: My attention is drawn to the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really high up, trying to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool itself looks terribly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it's tilting backward quite significantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily fall and seriously hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling down makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so engrossed in the cookies he doesn't seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet too, which would make a fall even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stabilize that stool right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for it to give way under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me incredibly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is very high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn him about how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, please don't let him fall!
segments.speaker: PAR
